title: FireFox Tech Help
content: hey! I am trying to import my safari browsing history to firefox, but it's not letting me. For some reason, it's allowing importing my bookmarks and not my history. Is there a way to export my browsing history from safari to firefox?
creator: jas.alvarez002

title: Why is the top section of Firefox disappearing and reappearing all of a sudden?
content: The top part of the Firefox screen - containing bookmarks and the address bar etc - keeps disappearing and reappearing, and I have to scroll back to the top of the page to make it reappear again if I need it while I am browsing further down the page. I assume this is part of a recent upgrade. How do I turn this feature off? It's really distracting and frankly annoying, as well as pointless on a desktop computer with a 32" screen.
creator: Peaches_57_x
